title: Apple reports second quarter results
snippet: Apple posted Q2 FY2024 revenue of $90.8B (−4% YoY) and EPS of $1.53. Services hit an all-time high while hardware softness weighed on the quarter.

title: WWDC24 highlights: Apple Intelligence and major OS updates
snippet: At WWDC, Apple unveiled Apple Intelligence across iPhone, iPad, and Mac, plus iOS 18, iPadOS 18, macOS Sequoia, watchOS 11, and visionOS 2.

title: Apple brings ChatGPT to Siri as it debuts 'Apple Intelligence' at WWDC 2024
snippet: Apple announced a partnership with OpenAI to integrate ChatGPT into Siri and showcased new AI features spanning messages, Photos, and system-wide summarization.

title: Apple's China market share shrinks as Huawei surges, data shows
snippet: Canalys data indicated Apple’s Q2 2024 China share fell to ~14% amid a resurgence from Huawei; discounts increased as Apple battled local rivals.

title: Apple reports third quarter results
snippet: Q3 FY2024 revenue came in at $85.8B (+5% YoY) with EPS up 11% YoY; Services set another record, offsetting uneven hardware demand.

title: WWDC 2024: Apple Intelligence, iOS 18, macOS Sequoia and more
snippet: Round-up of WWDC’s biggest announcements, including Apple Intelligence, revamped Siri, iOS 18 customization, and macOS Sequoia’s iPhone mirroring.

title: Apple brings ChatGPT to Siri as it debuts 'Apple Intelligence' at WWDC 2024
snippet: At WWDC on June 10, Apple unveiled 'Apple Intelligence' and a partnership to bring ChatGPT into Siri, alongside broad OS updates.

title: Apple reports record revenues despite stagnant iPhone sales
snippet: For fiscal Q3 2024, Apple posted 5% YoY revenue growth to $85.8B as Services set a record; iPhone was roughly flat.
